entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Wind becoming south 30 km/h near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. POP 30%
